    • actionPerformed

      public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e)
      Proceed further after clicking play.

      In fact delets play button from the screen, adds new buttons with all their respective controllers/pictures.

      Specified by:
      actionPerformed in interface ActionListener
      Parameters:
      e - - ActionEvent. In fact timer which allows to play buttons animations.
